name: oauth2-client-js
description: A client implementation for OAuth2 Implicit Grant

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly --  --compilers js:babel/register --require test/chai.js -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Nikolaus Piccolotto
